Bibliographic References: BMMA 21, 1962Non Sepcified3, p. 11, fig. 3; VMG., p. 228, no. 104 (ill.).
Imagery Description: (a) Young satyr, with r. hand held above his head and kantharos in 1., running to 1., followed by Dionysos, with fillet in r. hand, thyrsus in 1., and drapery across r. thigh and over 1. arm, (b) Bv + A2r.
